info.name: ascii art video async (132 ch)
info.description:
Smallest video-to-symbols shader.  ( try other than 13, or without - )
In this version: (better seen fullscreen)
- characters are displaced out of grid, along iso-lumi
- color
- degraded char choice compare to [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/XdGcRD[/url]
